TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You begin lactating. Edit: Nuts, just realized I corrupted two of yours in a row, sorry.

I wish people weren't so negative.

Granted. One electron is removed from each atom in your body, which promptly explodes from the electrostatic repulsion.

I wish I wanted to desire seeking illuminating enlightenment.

Granted. Your want of character to seek enlightenment was already in you. Suddenly a beam of light appears, and Spock smacks you in the face.

I wish for a box of deadly, deadly unstable isotopes.

Guys, it's not fun when wishes are already bad ideas.

Granted: You are then shoved into the box by a gang of hippies demanding world peace.

I wish for a chocolate chip cookie.

Granted. You get extraordinarily rendited to a CIA facility in somewherestan and interrogated as to how you came to acquire those isotopes.

Edit: God darn it. Umm...same thing, except it's about how you came to acquire cookies that actually contain weapons-grade uranium.

I wish to cut down a tree safely.
3illuminati5me

Granted, but the tree was endangered and you get fined and sent to prison for the rest of Jebediah's life.

I wish for moar boosters.

Ganted: You receive moar separatrons! 8-D

I wish elephants were pink.

so ninja'd

Granted. However, most of the albino elephants die from solar radiation.

I wish for a book.

Granted: the book is a 5189 year long book about nothing and you are forced into a small room to read it.

I wish this thread wasn't this long.

Granted.

I wish for slenderman to be my pet.

Granted. He's not very well trained and bites you, killing you.

I wish that the aurora is visible from where I live, without any catastrophic changes to solar activity or Earth's magnetic field.

Granted. The earth melts.

I wish for a new pair of socks.

Granted. But they were made by Dobby, and thus don't match.

I wish I could make my mind up.

granted. but you do not and your mind explodes.

I wish for the hogwarts express to fly and summon when i raise my hand at any given moment to take me to hogwarts,and i wish to be sorted into ravenclaw

Granted. Since I'm not a Harry Potter fan, I can't come up with a corruption.

I wish mud and my posts got less hate. By the way, I'm going to start WAY scaling down my mud content. But it won't be completely erased... probably.

Granted. Mud is now thoughtlessly destroyed by the evil police.

I wish for a new car.

*poof*

Your new car is materializes directly above your head.

I wish for a single, palm-sized gold doubloon sitting motionless on the table before me.

Granted. It's over 100,000,000,000 degrees Celsius, so it melts your face off.

I wish North Korea was never turned into a communist dictatorship in 1948, or that it had never developed nukes or its military-first policy.

Granted. It instead turned into 5 million tons of highly radioactive materials, killing the entire population of earth.

I wish the for letter "E"

Edited November 12, 2014 by temporalExile

Granted- Ã„â€™

I wish for 8zip.

Granted. But 8zip hasnt come out yet so the company sues you for wishing for it.

I wish i could have a santa sled craft and give out to all the kerbals.

Granted, but KSP keeps crashing when you load it.

I wish for ammo for a Gatling Laser.

Granted. It's a few hundred years old. It's long leaked already and only has enough charge to charge your phone for 2%.

I wish for a safe, cuddly and unagressive living regulus regulus.

Granted. But then you wake up and realize it was a dream.

I wish for no one to touch the hair.
